item.title: Azure Update Manager – Patching .NET Core
item.description: This blog will share how to configure an Azure Virtual Machine or an Azure Arc-enabled virtual machine to utilize Azure Update Manager for patching .NET Core security updates. There are two different changes that need to be made to the server to allow .NET Core to receive updates with Azure Update Manager: Step 1: Create a registry entry for .NET core updates Step 2: Change the Windows Server to receive other Microsoft Updates for patching.
